metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The recent CPU usage for the whole system
metricSpecifications.name: system.cpu.usage

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The recent CPU usage for the JVM process
metricSpecifications.name: process.cpu.usage

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Memory assigned to JVM in bytes
metricSpecifications.name: jvm.memory.committed

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The maximum amount of memory in bytes that can be used for memory management
metricSpecifications.name: jvm.memory.max

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Max size of old generation memory pool
metricSpecifications.name: jvm.gc.max.data.size

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Size of old generation memory pool after a full GC
metricSpecifications.name: jvm.gc.live.data.size

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Count of positive increases in the size of the old generation memory pool before GC to after GC
metricSpecifications.name: jvm.gc.memory.promoted

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Incremented for an increase in the size of the young generation memory pool after one GC to before the next
metricSpecifications.name: jvm.gc.memory.allocated

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: % time the process has utilized the CPU
metricSpecifications.name: cpu-usage

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Amount of working set used by the process (MB)
metricSpecifications.name: working-set

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Total heap size reported by the GC (MB)
metricSpecifications.name: gc-heap-size

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: % time in GC since the last GC
metricSpecifications.name: time-in-gc

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Number of bytes allocated in the managed heap
metricSpecifications.name: alloc-rate

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Number of times there were contention when trying to take the monitor lock
metricSpecifications.name: monitor-lock-contention-count

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Number of timers that are currently active
metricSpecifications.name: active-timer-count

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Total number of requests in the lifetime of the process
metricSpecifications.name: total-requests

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Total number of requests in processing in the lifetime of the process
metricSpecifications.name: current-requests

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Total number of failed requests in the lifetime of the process
metricSpecifications.name: failed-requests

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The recent CPU usage for the app
metricSpecifications.name: PodCpuUsage

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The recent Memory usage for the app
metricSpecifications.name: PodMemoryUsage

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The recent CPU usage for the app. This metric is being deprecated. Please use "App CPU Usage" with metric id "PodCpuUsage".
metricSpecifications.name: AppCpuUsage

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Cumulative count of bytes received in the app
metricSpecifications.name: PodNetworkIn

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Cumulative count of bytes sent from the app
metricSpecifications.name: PodNetworkOut

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Count of bytes received by Azure Spring Apps from the clients
metricSpecifications.name: IngressBytesReceived

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Count of bytes sent by Azure Spring Apps to the clients
metricSpecifications.name: IngressBytesSent

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Count of requests by Azure Spring Apps from the clients
metricSpecifications.name: IngressRequests

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Count of failed requests by Azure Spring Apps from the clients
metricSpecifications.name: IngressFailedRequests

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: HTTP response status returned by Azure Spring Apps. The response status code distribution can be further categorized to show responses in 2xx, 3xx, 4xx, and 5xx categories
metricSpecifications.name: IngressResponseStatus

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Http response time return by Azure Spring Apps
metricSpecifications.name: IngressResponseTime

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Bytes received per second by Azure Spring Apps from the clients
metricSpecifications.name: IngressBytesReceivedRate

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Bytes sent per second by Azure Spring Apps to the clients
metricSpecifications.name: IngressBytesSentRate

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of the throttled requests
metricSpecifications.name: GatewayRatelimitThrottledCount

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The recent CPU usage for the JVM process
metricSpecifications.name: GatewayProcessCpuUsage

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The recent CPU usage for the whole system
metricSpecifications.name: GatewaySystemCpuUsage

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Incremented for an increase in the size of the young generation memory pool after one GC to before the next
metricSpecifications.name: GatewayJvmGcMemoryAllocatedBytesTotal

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Count of positive increases in the size of the old generation memory pool before GC to after GC
metricSpecifications.name: GatewayJvmGcMemoryPromotedBytesTotal

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Size of old generation memory pool after a full GC
metricSpecifications.name: GatewayJvmGcLiveDataSizeBytes

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Max size of old generation memory pool
metricSpecifications.name: GatewayJvmGcMaxDataSizeBytes

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Memory assigned to JVM in bytes
metricSpecifications.name: GatewayJvmMemoryCommittedBytes

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: CPU consumed by Spring App, in nano cores. 1,000,000,000 nano cores = 1 core
metricSpecifications.name: UsageNanoCores

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Spring App working set memory used in bytes.
metricSpecifications.name: WorkingSetBytes
